snippet: Third Point, which is the middle of a contentious proxy battle with Yahoo, called for the dismissal of the company’s chief executive, Scott Thompson, after revealing that he had inaccurately stated his credentials.
abstract: Third Point, which is the middle of a contentious proxy battle with Yahoo, called for the dismissal of the company’s chief executive, Scott Thompson, after revealing that he had inaccurately stated his credentials.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Hedge Fund Intensifies Attack on Yahoo Amid Storm Over Padded Résumés
headline.print_headline: Hedge Fund Intensifies Attacks on Yahoo As Storm Grows Over Padded Résumés
